name: Allsome Inc.
description: Developer of e-commerce fulfillment software intended to provide parcel tracking systems to track packages delivered from online e-commerce sites. The company's software offers a cross-border fulfillment option to track, and get notified for easy order management without heavy investments, enabling companies to take care of their online businesses.
one_liner: Developer of e-commerce fulfillment software intended to provide parcel tracking systems to track packages delivered from online e-commerce sites. The company's software offers a cross-border fulfillment option to track, and get notified for easy order management without heavy investments, enabling companies to take care of their online businesses.
